meanings.definition: Showing or requiring excessive attention to detail or minor points
meanings.sent1: She is the finnickiest person I know when it comes to choosing colors for her paintings.
meanings.sent2: The artist was known for being the finnickiest when it came to the placement of each brushstroke.
meanings.sent3: Even the finnickiest cat couldn't resist playing with a simple ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: Her finnickiest nature was like a magnifying glass, zooming in on every tiny imperfection.
meanings.sent5: The finnickiest details of the intricate design made it truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: He was the finnickiest eater, carefully inspecting each bite before taking it.
meanings.sent2: The tailor's work was praised for its finnickiest stitching and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The finnickiest shopper spent hours comparing prices before making a purchase.
meanings.sent4: Her finnickiest taste in music made her a tough critic to impress.
meanings.sent5: The finnickiest chef in town always created dishes that were a delight to the taste buds.

meanings.definition: Excessively critical or hard to please
meanings.sent1: The movie critic was known for being the finnickiest reviewer in the industry.
meanings.sent2: She was the finnickiest judge, never giving out a perfect score easily.
meanings.sent3: Even the finnickiest of guests couldn't find fault with the delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: His finnickiest attitude towards teamwork made collaboration a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The finnickiest customer always kept the staff on their toes with high demands.
